name: Elec
description: A match-based, competitive, VR racing game heavily inspired by 80s futurism.

name: After
description: In the thick of a dustbowl—where the poor beg for scraps from the rich—play as a driver trying to survive the wastelands taking any job he can to get by. Caught between a hail of bullets and a colorful cast of characters, the fate of the community rests on your decisions. Drive fast, choose wisely.

name: This Starry Void
description: A first-person sci-fi dungeon crawler featuring combat, exploration, and existentialism.

name: Nympho wife
description: This is a novel game with adult expressions. Click only to advance the story. Please enjoy the sexy female sex expressions.

name: Magical Girl Creator
description: Want to create your own magical girl? Now you can with the ultimate magical girl creator! Choose from tons of cute outfits and hairstyles to create the magical girl or female superheroine of your dreams!

name: Hanako's flower shop
description: Hanako’s Flower Shop is a heartfelt visual novel where you run a flower shop, crafting bouquets using the language of flowers. Listen to customers’ stories, shape Hanako’s journey through choices, and navigate her struggle to honor her grandpa’s legacy while discovering her own path.

name: Webcup Soccer
description: Old-school online arcade soccer game with fast-paced graphics, responsive controls and accurate ball physics.

name: Little Dog Bob
description: Make Bob happy by collecting stars and crossing obstacles. Run through a vibrant world with an imaginative and sometimes even abstract landscape.

name: Dracula's Castle
description: Dracula's Castle invites you to play as the infamous ruler of Wallachia, the Vampire King, Count Dracula! Manage the Transylvanian noble's dark domain by recruiting minions and expanding the castle. Stalk the local towns and keep an eye out for Jonathan Harker and the Count's archenemy, Van Helsing!

name: Fled fierce city
description: This is a first person shooting action game，Players are surrounded by enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding area，Players need to avoid the enemy's attack or kill the enemy，Killing the enemy can rob the enemy of his weapons,Keep your health as long as possible.

name: EverWorld
description: EverWorld is a procedurally generated, action RPG adventure with deeply simulated artificial intelligence.

name: Bricole
description: Bricole is the only cria left with the ability to store energy while falling and release its spring-jump potential. They use this to scale the tallest mountain to jump off from and launch out into space so that they can feel safer alone from the monsters within.

name: DvG: Conquering Giants
description: DvG is an imaginative twist on the classic story of David vs Goliath where you are the shepherd boy, armed with a simple, yet powerful sling, facing off versus the giant Goliath and all his minions.

name: The December Effect
description: The December Effect is a work of interactive fiction about the dynamic between three characters, but it's also a narrative-driven collection of 31 games, which were each made in one day (irl!). The game takes place inside a chat client, and the games are accessed by clicking on attachments.

name: Garage Ninja
description: A Turn-Based RPG following Garage Ninja as he seeks to overthrow the Evil Kathleen Kennedy and restore his clan. Meet zany Fully Voiced Characters and explore an expansive original world. With over 3 Quests, more than 5 skills, and 30 different genres, Garage Ninja has something for everyone.

name: Samsara
description: Saṃsāra is a souls-like that challenges players to meditate on overcoming loss, failure and death through a core mechanic of reincarnation as 9 different avatars. A 3D, third-person, action role-playing game (RPG) in the vein of the ‘Soulsborne’ genre and Shadow of the Colossus.

name: Extreme Social Distancing
description: Avoid, infect, or seriously inconvenience your friends with this twin stick, topically relevant, local multiplayer party game. Each stick controls a poor soul who just wants to be left alone, to get away from the possibly infected, and to completely and utterly avoid those with obvious symptoms.

name: Shikoku Kororozashi Deluxe: Sake Jidori Udon Senki
description: 稀代の飯テロ&観光ゲーここに爆誕!? 四国を征服し、ヒロインといっしょに観光したり、グルメを満喫しよう! 地元民ですら唸る、ディープな四国戦略SLG。

description: An indie horror game from a first-person perspective where the player explores a mansion through the use of puzzle-solving, finding specific items and trying to avoid unknown dangers. The particular focus of the game is atmosphere, mystery and scares as well as continual story development.
